p: The results of docking experiments between BVM, compounds 3â€“ 5 and selected cellular proteins are shown in Table 4. According to the results of docking for the target proteins, all tested compounds showed a lower degree of fit to tested proteins compared to BVM. These results may indicate that modification of the bevirimat molecule by substitution of the carboxyl group by a phosphate substituent probably does not increase toxicity of phosphate derivatives compared to BVM.
